title: RIOT GIMME MY LP
body: Played a bunch of ranked games today and for some weird reason I was losing 30 lp per loss and only gained 13 when I won. As soon as I hit 0lp i demoted to silver 1 even though my mmr is still gold 4. GIMME MY LP BACK THIS IS RIDICULOUS.

replies.body:
I had the same thing happen and got told on my support ticket that there was no issue with the LP gains/Losses when even on the client it says there are issues with it...
Go figure

The client *doesn't* say there are issues with LP. The client specifies demotion/promotion issues, which are in fact separate. It's *possible* there are issues with LP at the moment, but unless it's confirmed to be an actual issue, and not just the system adjusting to new tiers/divisions it's unwise to assume that's the case.
Riot is so fucking useless with player support
